awd_titl_txt: Maintaining SURAnet Connectivity and Campus Networking:  A  Cost Sharing Venture
awd_abstract_narration: The Florida Institute of Technology will connect their campus                   network to SURAnet (Southeastern Universities Research                          Association network, a regional network which is part of the                    NSFNET).  Direct connection to SURAnet will provide researchers                 with improved access to national networks such as CSNET/Bitnet                  and USENET.  Improvement is sought in reliability, speed, turn-                 around, flexibility, and functions such as file transfer, remote                login, and teleconferencing.  The Florida Institute for                         Technolgy, through this connection to an external network, will                 be able to maximize existing local computing resources,                         facilitate access to external information and remote computing                  resources, and provide a connection for scholarly interaction                   with faculty and researchers in diverse geographical locations.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
org_div_long_name: Division Of Computer and Network Systems
